p: Mineral contribution to DRI per 100 gram serving for essential and trace minerals calculated. Food that provide more than 10% of a nutrient per serving are considered good source of that nutrient [ 48]. Tilapia fillets from the U.S. marketplace of this study can provide more than 10% of the select minerals including Se, P for adult and Cu, Mg, P, Se for children and hence are considered good source of these minerals.
